com.amadeus

Class HTTPClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amadeus.HTTPClient
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Amadeus

    public class HTTPClient
extends java.lang.Object
    The HTTP part of the Amadeus API client. See the Amadeus class for more details on initialization.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public Response get(java.lang.String path)
             throws ResponseException
        A helper module for making generic GET requests calls. It is used by every namespaced API GET method.
        Throws:
        ResponseException
        See Also:
        get(String, Params)

      • get

        public Response get(java.lang.String path,
                    Params params)
             throws ResponseException

        A helper module for making generic GET requests calls. It is used by every namespaced API GET method. 

           amadeus.referenceData.urls.checkinLinks.get(Params.with("airline", "1X"));

        It can be used to make any generic API call that is automatically authenticated using your API credentials: 

            amadeus.get("/v2/reference-data/urls/checkin-links", Params.with("airline", "1X"));
        Parameters:
        path - The full path for the API call
        params - The optional GET params to pass to the API
        Returns:
        a Response object containing the status code, body, and parsed data.
        Throws:
        ResponseException

      • delete

        public Response delete(java.lang.String path,
                       Params params)
                throws ResponseException

        A helper module for making generic DELETE requests calls. It is used by every namespaced API DELETE method. 

           amadeus.booking.flightOrder("eJzTd9f3NjIJdzUGAAp%2fAiY=").delete();

        It can be used to make any generic API call that is automatically authenticated using your API credentials: 

            amadeus.delete("/v1/foo/bar", Params.with("airline", "1X"));
        Parameters:
        path - The full path for the API call
        params - The optional DELETE params to pass to the API
        Returns:
        a Response object containing the status code, body, and parsed data.
        Throws:
        ResponseException

      • delete

        public Response delete(java.lang.String path)
                throws ResponseException
        A helper module for making generic DELETE requests calls. It is used by every namespaced API DELETE method.
        Throws:
        ResponseException
        See Also:
        delete(String, Params)

        Throws:

      • post

        public Response post(java.lang.String path,
                     Params params)
              throws ResponseException

        A helper module for making generic POST requests calls. It is used by every namespaced API POST method. 

           amadeus.foo.bar.post(Params.with("airline", "1X"));

        It can be used to make any generic API call that is automatically authenticated using your API credentials: 

            amadeus.post("/v1/foo/bar", Params.with("airline", "1X"));
        Parameters:
        path - The full path for the API call
        params - The optional POST params to pass to the API
        Returns:
        a Response object containing the status code, body, and parsed data.
        Throws:
        ResponseException

      • post

        public Response post(java.lang.String path,
                     java.lang.String body)
              throws ResponseException

        A helper module for making generic POST requests calls. It is used by every namespaced API POST method. 

           amadeus.foo.bar.post(Params.with("airline", "1X"));

        It can be used to make any generic API call that is automatically authenticated using your API credentials: 

            amadeus.post("/v1/foo/bar", Params.with("airline", "1X"));
        Parameters:
        path - The full path for the API call
        body - The optional POST params to pass to the API
        Returns:
        a Response object containing the status code, body, and parsed data.
        Throws:
        ResponseException

      • post

        public Response post(java.lang.String path,
                     com.google.gson.JsonObject body)
              throws ResponseException

        A helper module for making generic POST requests calls. It is used by every namespaced API POST method.

        It can be used to make any generic API call that is automatically authenticated using your API credentials: 

            amadeus.post("/v1/foo/bar", { "foo" : "bar" })
        Parameters:
        path - The full path for the API call
        body - The POST JsonObject body to pass to the API
        Returns:
        a Response object containing the status code, body, and parsed data.
        Throws:
        ResponseException

      • post

        public Response post(java.lang.String path,
                     Params params,
                     com.google.gson.JsonObject body)
              throws ResponseException

        A helper module for making generic POST requests calls. It is used by every namespaced API POST method.

        It can be used to make any generic API call that is automatically authenticated using your API credentials: 

            amadeus.post("/v1/foo/bar", Params.with("airline", "1X"), { "foo" : "bar" })
        Parameters:
        path - The full path for the API call
        params - The optional POST params to pass to the API
        body - The POST JsonObject body to pass to the API
        Returns:
        a Response object containing the status code, body, and parsed data.
        Throws:
        ResponseException

      • post

        public Response post(java.lang.String path,
                     Params params,
                     java.lang.String body)
              throws ResponseException

        A helper module for making generic POST requests calls. It is used by every namespaced API POST method.

        It can be used to make any generic API call that is automatically authenticated using your API credentials: 

            amadeus.post("/v1/foo/bar", Params.with("airline", "1X"), { "foo" : "bar" })
        Parameters:
        path - The full path for the API call
        params - The optional POST params to pass to the API
        body - The POST String object body to pass to the API
        Returns:
        a Response object containing the status code, body, and parsed data.
        Throws:
        ResponseException

      • unauthenticatedRequest

        public Response unauthenticatedRequest(java.lang.String verb,
                                       java.lang.String path,
                                       Params params,
                                       java.lang.String body,
                                       java.lang.String bearerToken)
                                throws ResponseException
        A generic method for making any authenticated or unauthenticated request, passing in the bearer token explicitly. Used primarily by the AccessToken to get the first AccessToken.
        Throws:
        ResponseException

      • previous

        public Response previous(Response response)
                  throws ResponseException
        Fetches the previous page for a given response.
        Parameters:
        response - a response object previously received for which includes an array of data
        Returns:
        a new response of data
        Throws:
        ResponseException - if the page could not be found

      • previous

        public Resource[] previous(Resource resource)
                    throws ResponseException
        Fetches the previous page for a given response.
        Parameters:
        resource - one of the responses previously received from an API call
        Returns:
        a new array of resources of the same type
        Throws:
        ResponseException - if the page could not be found
